{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.07511v1", "title": "The finite basis problem for additively idempotent semirings of order
  four, III", "summary": "We study the finite basis problem for $4$-element additively idempotent
semirings whose additive reducts have two minimal elements and one coatom. Up
to isomorphism, there are $112$ such algebras. We show that $106$ of them are
finitely based and the remaining ones are nonfinitely based.", "main_category": "math.GR", "categories": "math.GR", "published": "2025-04-10T07:14:04Z"}
